long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Placer Land Trust Shopping Button is a Chrome browser extension that notifies users when they visit an online merchant who will donate a portion of every purchase to the Placer Land Trust. 

The user may also visit the Placer Land Trust Shop to Give Network site at http://plt.shoppinganddonation.com/ to find additional online stores that participate in this Placer Land Trust donation program.
